name: Enigmas of Tesla
description:
This is my second enigma game,  the first in on my profile and have how Main Character Sherlock Holmes.

THE GAME IS FREE, THE SCREEN OF PAYMENT IS TO DONATES.

GAMING INSTRUCTIONS:

  • To the cryptography and descryptography use the website bellow: https://www.invertexto.com.
  • To Cesar cryptography and descryptography I recommend the website: https://rot13.com
  • The questions can have Cesar cryptography, Morse code, Binary Code, Crypt Text by Invertexto and Image edit.
  • The answers need to be with CAPS LOWER.
  • Save the LEVEL PASSWORD to be able to acess the level you stoped on the level selector screen.

Give  a message on Discord  Group if you want a tip or to give a opinion of the game: https://discord.gg/HETkbbj7gP.
